data.title: AMD CEO Lisa Su On DeepSeek's AI Disruption: 'Training And Inference With Less Infrastructure Is A Good Thing' — But GPUs, Not ASICs, Will Still Power The Future Of AI Chips
data.description: AMD CEO Lisa Su sees DeepSeek's AI advancements as a positive step for AI adoption but maintains that GPUs will remain dominant over ASICs.

data.title: Alex Karp Says Elon Musk's DOGE Initiative Will Be 'Very Good' For Palantir: 'Expecting To See Really Unexpected Things And To Win'
data.description: In recent news, Palantir Technologies Inc. (NYSE: PLTR) CEO, Alex Karp, has shown enthusiasm for Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) and its potential influence on his company.

data.title: 'Pharma Bro' Martin Shkreli Defends Palantir's Valuation Amid 24% Surge, Says AI Firm's Cash Flow Justifies 'Expensive' Price
data.description: Martin Shkreli, the former hedge fund manager known as "Pharma Bro," defended Palantir Technologies Inc.'s valuation on Tuesday amid the company's surging stock price, projecting substantial cash flow growth for the data analytics firm through 2025.

data.title: Tesla Bear Expects EV Giant's Earnings To Fall Below Bullish Estimates In 2025, Notes Majority Of Company's Revenues Come From Car Deliveries
data.description: Tesla bear Gordon Johnson slammed bulls for their high price targets based on the assumption that the company is "more than a car company."

data.title: XRP Ledger Suffers Hour-Long Outage Before Recovery: Ripple CTO Says 'Silent Network' Failure Didn't Impact User Funds
data.description: The XRP Ledger (XRPL), the blockchain network that powers XRP (CRYPTO: XRP), experienced an unprecedented hour-long interruption in block production on Tuesday before spontaneously recovering, according to Ripple‘s Chief Technology Officer David Schwartz.
